subject: RE: [junit] JUnit 4 article published
msgSnippet: That s a really good article, Elliotte.  It s clear and well written. And my unsolicited 2 cents: I m not going to miss the GUI test runner, but I don t like
messageBody:
That's a really good article, Elliotte. It's clear and well written.

And my unsolicited 2 cents: I'm not going to miss the GUI test runner, but I don't like merging Errors and Failures.


Todd.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
> Behalf Of Elliotte Harold
> Sent: Wednesday, September 14, 2005 10:49 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] JUnit 4 article published
>
> IBM's developerWorks has published my latest article, An
> early look at JUnit 4:
>

> together. Thanks!
